Field `RECORD_TYPE_MINDFULNESS_SESSION` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.mindfulness())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `RecordMapper` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_MINDFULNESS) to transfer requirement to caller`)
